documentation.text:
@dev This library defines the `History` struct, for checkpointing values as they change at different points in
 time, and later looking up past values by block number. See {Votes} as an example.
 To create a history of checkpoints define a variable type `Checkpoints.History` in your contract, and store a new
 checkpoint for the current transaction block using the {push} function.
 _Available since v4.5._

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Checkpoints.Checkpoint storage ref[] storage ref
struct Checkpoints.Checkpoint storage ref[] storage ref

documentation.text: @dev Returns the value in the latest checkpoint, or zero if there are no checkpoints.

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Checkpoints.Checkpoint storage ref[] storage ref
struct Checkpoints.Checkpoint storage ref[] storage ref
struct Checkpoints.Checkpoint storage ref[] storage ref

documentation.text:
@dev Returns the value at a given block number. If a checkpoint is not available at that block, the closest one
 before it is returned, or zero otherwise.

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Checkpoints.Checkpoint storage ref[] storage ref
function (struct Checkpoints.History storage pointer) view returns (uint256)
struct Checkpoints.Checkpoint storage ref[] storage ref

function (struct Checkpoints.Checkpoint storage ref[] storage pointer,struct Checkpoints.Checkpoint storage ref)

documentation.text:
@dev Pushes a value onto a History so that it is stored as the checkpoint for the current block.
 Returns previous value and new value.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Checkpoints.History storage pointer) view returns (uint256)

devdoc.details: This library defines the `History` struct, for checkpointing values as they change at different points in time, and later looking up past values by block number. See {Votes} as an example. To create a history of checkpoints define a variable type `Checkpoints.History` in your contract, and store a new checkpoint for the current transaction block using the {push} function. _Available since v4.5._
